otherNames: Maria Watches Over Us: Printemps, The Virgin Mary is Watching You: Spring, MariMite: Haru, La Vierge Marie Vous Regarde, マリア様がみてる～春～
synopsis: Life goes on for the ladies in the Yamayurikai. On the one-year anniversary of Sachiko and Yumi becoming sisters, Yumi receives a difficult task from Sachiko: to finally acknowledge someone as her younger sister.
